  • Constructor Details

    • CardModel

      public CardModel(CardModel.CardColor color, CardModel.CardValue value)
      Constructer of CardModel.
      Parameters:
      color - Couleur de la carte (HEART, DIAMOND, SPADE, CLUB).
      value - Valeur de la carte (ACE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, SIX, SEVEN, EIGHT, NINE, TEN, JACK, QUEEN, KING).

    • CardModel

      public CardModel(int color, int value)
      Constructer of CardModel.
      Parameters:
      color - a int which represents the position in CardColor declaration (0 = HEART, ... , 3 = CLUB).
      value - a int which represents the position in CardValue declaration (0 = ACE, ... , 12 = KING).
